Queries.blackbox: select datetime(substr(ImgRef,7,4)||'-'||substr(ImgRef,4,2)||'-'||substr(ImgRef,1,2) ||' '|| substr(ImgRef,12,2)||':'|| substr(ImgRef,15,2)||':'|| substr(ImgRef,18,2)) as DATE_, Thermal from blackbox where DATE_ IS NOT NULL and DATE_ >= DATE('{}')
Queries.wendy_king: select datetime(substr(ImgRef,7,4)||'-'||substr(ImgRef,4,2)||'-'||substr(ImgRef,1,2) ||' '|| substr(ImgRef,12,2)||':'|| substr(ImgRef,15,2)||':'|| substr(ImgRef,18,2)) as DATE_, Thermal from wendy_king where DATE_ IS NOT NULL and DATE_ >= DATE('{}')
